items.text: fuller once more, whipped towards deep midwicket for one

items.preText: Nasrin A Poly: "@ Hemant @,,,,,,the live tv commentators shows the list of highest run makers of 3 match odi series it is strange to see Imrul Kayes not in the list, he made 349 runs in 3 odi series aganist Zim, 144,90,115. he should have take the 2nd place of the list" -- Didn't see the list but you are right
items.text: fuller on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: tossed up, a low full toss on middle leg, pushed towards mid-on
length around off, sharp turn to beat the bat as Tamim was looking to play it off the back foot, an appeal for leg-before, not out
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of length, rocks backs and pulls it towards deep square leg, a diving effort in the deep but in vain
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushes it to short midwicket
items.postText: Over to Saurabh for the next ten overs
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Thanks again Hemant. Status quo maintained, with Bangladesh in control
items.text: gets an under-edge on that to get to fifty Seventh half-century in ODIs. length ball outside off that kept low, he wanted to cut it, but it took the under edge and went in between the keeper's legs
fuller and driven to long-on
fullish on the stumps, he gets to the pitch of the ball to turn it towards square leg
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: that has wings on it came down the track, got to the pitch perfectly, and the ball was in the right hitting arc for him to swing his arms through, and lift this way over midwicket. 95 metres
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: quicker one, pitching on off and spinning away, bunted back
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: more air miles almost a repeat from two balls ago, he comes down the track again to one pushed outside off, frees his arms and swings it high and mighty over midwicket. that went 99 metres
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.preText: Bangladesh were going along steadily. Now they're galloping
items.text: fuller outside off, turned round the corner to fine leg from outside off

items.preText: Chris Taunton: "On the subject of lists, it would be fascinating to see figures showing how many runs have been scored and wickets have been taken during the commentary sessions of each commentator. Who has commented on the most notable events, ties and hat tricks, etc. Who has the most wins or losses under their belt, etc." - I suspect Ravi Shastri might beat everyone to it
items.text: flatter outside off, bunted to long-on
shorter and flatter, he rocks back to pull, but goes straight to short midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: delicate thrown side of off, flat again. He stays back and late cuts it with finesse to third man
fuller on off, he comes on the front foot to work it to midwicket
good length, wide of off, spinning into him. Stays in his crease and defends
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Sadman: "Much needed 50 for Somuya. And Look at those SIXES!! This guy is a firecracker. He just needs to balance his body and check the shot selection. "
items.text: fuller on leg stump, tucked to deep square leg

items.preText: Mmp: "Windies had one bowler who troubled batsmen in this odi series and they dropped him in the series decider. Oshane was available for selection. Can we call it a brainfade from team management? " - pretty much. As both Hemant and I mentioned on the ball by ball, it was doubly strange because Rovman Powell had spoken of Bangladesh being 'weak' against pace
items.text: on leg stump again and turned to deep square leg again
goes straighter now but too full and driven with a straight bat face to long-on
fuller, angling across the batsman, who drives it from off-stump to long-off
length ball but again on leg stump, which allows them to pick of runs to deep square leg by just clipping the ball there
fuller, angling into the batsman from round the wicket that time. Steered to point
items.shortText: Powell to Tamim Iqbal, no run
